ygData.subject: Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, I ve been away for a while for summer but I am back now to once again join the ranks of the glad. Alright, I m the guy putting together the page for the
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 43
Message-ID: <17248.43.123.959279670@...>
Date: 21 Aug 1999 04:32:37 -0000
From: shayd@...
Subject: Levels!


Okay, I've been away for a while for summer but I
am back now to once again join the ranks of the
glad.

Alright, I'm the guy putting together the page for
the gladiator levels.  I am more than happy to be
doing this but I'm a human being and school is
going to be starting up soon which means I'll be
having less and less time (my senior year).

If you guys already have some levels done, great!
Send them along to my email address (which is,
shayd@...) and not the list itself and
I will get back to you.

If you have an idea for a level or are in the
process of making a cluster (or a single Glad
scenario) PLEASE tell me first if you want the
level to be included on my list.  The reason I am
asking you all of this is that some of your levels
may be using the same filenames as levels that
have been sent in by other people.  Specify how
many rooms you expect your set of scenarios to be
and I will assign you with numbers that you can
use.

The above is only if you want you Gladiator
scenarios included on my list.  If you're making
them for yourself and close friends only, hell if
I care (but you might want to confer just in case
an upcoming scenario will be lost or will over-
write the scenario you make).

I'll be redoing my page soon to be easier for
players with non-frame interfaces or slower
connections to be navigate through by use of
tables and less graphics, but this won't be done
until I get the list going.

If any of this is unclear to any of you feel free,
once again, to drop me a letter.

-Chris/Shayd
    http://plaza.v-wave.com/shayd/
    ICQ# : 18074806

PS
Oh, and Tom (and the rest of FSGames)-- I got
Ender's Game, that book is *awesome*.  I also got
the third sequel Xenocide which I'm in the midst
of reading. >:)
